pullrequest.title: Enable test report in pipelines: test are failing although CI was green

content.raw:
> I would address that separately from this PR

sounds good

> ros-melodic-desktop is installed by the subt_shell docker file and wiki instructions

I'm not sure what `subt_shell` is used for, but I think we shouldn't be instructing users to install [desktop](http://www.ros.org/reps/rep-0150.html#desktop-variants), since it brings a lot of tools and tutorials that are not needed to compete. It's just making the docker image larger. I'd make sure not to install it on cloudsim for example.

I can understand it being installed with the wiki instructions because it brings visualization tools that may be handy to competitors just starting with ROS. But even for that case, maybe `ros-melodic-viz` would be more appropriate.
